      • deleteCustomer

        public void deleteCustomer​(int id)
        Deletes a customer based on the customer ID. Deletes any appointments linked to the customer first due to foreign key restraints.
        Specified by:
        deleteCustomer in interface CustomerDAO
        Parameters:
        id - Customer ID parameter that specify the customer to delete.
